trigger.element: Pfotencard

<Link to="/">
                  <NavigationMenuLink
                    className={`text-base font-body transition-colors hover:text-primary cursor-pointer ${
                      isActive('/') ? 'text-primary font-medium' : 'text-foreground'
                    }`}
                  >
                    Home
                  </NavigationMenuLink>
                </Link>
